Title: Tape 1, Side A
Writer: Brian Yorkey (teleplay by), Brian Yorkey (created for television by), Jay Asher (based upon the book by)
Actors: Dylan Minnette, Katherine Langford, Christian Navarro, Alisha Boe
Plot: As the school mourns the death of Hannah Baker, her friend Clay receives a box of tapes with messages she recorded before committing suicide.
